title: Leona
body:
Just a quick question about Leona

I haven't tried her since her updated ultimate, but I'm reading the patch notes here and it just seems off. She gains Incandescence for 5 seconds, at max rank this affects 5 auto attacks. Does Leona have the attack speed to perform 5 autos in 5 seconds? Seems you would need to use your AA resets to get all 5 in... Doesn't that limit the damage from her passive? Like I said I haven't tried her, anyone have testimonies that this works well?

replies.body: You get an extra 5s to land the next Incandescence empowered auto attack each time you land one, so you shouldn't need attack speed to get them off if you're near the enemy moderately regularly. That's not currently clear enough though, so we'll be doing some work to make it easier to track how many charges you've used (counter on the spell icon or something similar).
